item.title: CloudFormation
item.description: Step 1 - Deploy CloudFormation Template Right click the Launch Stack button below and open the link in a new tab. Navigate to the new tab you just opened. You should see a screen similar to the one below Continue to click on the Next buttons until you arrive at the final review screen. Scroll to the bottom of this page Click on Create stack
